Name: Fantasy Street Scene Occasional Chair
Description:
Fantasy Street Scene Occasional Chair

  • Made from soft, quality ChiChi fabric with plump cushioning for luxurious, cosy and comfortable seating.
  • Made from beech wood with a long-lasting, elegant finish and print, which is designed to add warmth and uplift your decor for years to come.
  • Bespoke and expertly handmade to order, giving you the finest quality straight to your door.
  • A 10-year guarantee on print, build and finish to give you the most superior excellence and value.

This stylish, elegant accent chair would make a beautiful addition to any room in your chic, contemporary home. It will definitely bring an element of class to your bedroom or hallway, and would really work well in your living room. This type of chair will certainly bring a modern twist to your bedroom decor, especially if used as a dressing table chair or desk chair.

Expertly crafted and upholstered, this bespoke accent chair radiates luxury and instantly brings any room to life by infusing colour and warmth. This is a unique design for a show-stopping piece of furniture that brightens any room and reflects your individual style. This is a fabulous occasional chair to personalise your space and add a high end feel to your home that you can always enjoy. As our chairs are covered in fire rated, ChiChi velour fabric, that's super soft, smooth and hardwearing. Our chairs are practical, stunning pieces of furniture that will make your house a fabulous home.

This is a one of a kind accent chair that will add the finishing touch to any room. It will allow you to inject your character into your home and proudly showcase your lovely style to family and friends. It will also show the love, pride and joy you take in making your home, a beautiful one.

Our accent chairs are decorative, exceptional and are designed to be the feature of any room in your home, and make an exclusive statement. One which is gorgeous, distinctive and sensational.

HOW YOUR CHAIRS ARE MADE

We're proud to say that your occasional chair will be handmade and printed to precision by our upholstery professionals. Up to four elements of the chair are printed onto ChiChi fabric, cut to size and then hand stitched and assembled to ensure an excellent finish. The frame and tapered legs are constructed using responsibly sourced beech wood that provides a sturdy and robust structure. We use specialist dye sublimation so the ink is fused deep into the fibres of the fabric, creating a gorgeous permanent print that won't fade, rub or peel away. The plump cushioning is made from firm foam, wadding and webbing, creating a highly comfortable seat to kick back and relax on.

DIMENSIONS

  • Full height 74cm, full width 63cm, seat depth 49cm
  • Front leg height 23cm, back leg height 19cm
  • Backrest height 55cm, backrest width 50cm
  • Weighs 7kg

CARE INSTRUCTIONS

Our ChiChi Furnishing Velour fabric is fire retardant, so your chair can easily be wiped down with a damp cloth. Give it a regular brush to keep the fibres soft, smooth and in pristine condition.

We're proud to say that your occasional chair will be handmade and printed to precision by our upholstery professionals. Up to four elements of the chair are printed onto ChiChi fabric, cut to size and then hand stitched and assembled to ensure an excellent finish. The frame and tapered legs are constructed using responsibly sourced beech wood that provides a sturdy and robust structure. We use specialist dye sublimation so the ink is fused deep into the fibres of the fabric, creating a gorgeous permanent print that won't fade, rub or peel away. The plump cushioning is made from firm foam, wadding and webbing, creating a highly comfortable seat to kick back and relax on.

DIMENSIONS

  • Full height 74cm, full width 63cm, seat depth 49cm
  • Front leg height 23cm, back leg height 19cm
  • Backrest height 55cm, backrest width 50cm
  • Weighs 7kg

CARE INSTRUCTIONS

Our ChiChi Furnishing Velour fabric is fire retardant, so your chair can easily be wiped down with a damp cloth. Give it a regular brush to keep the fibres soft, smooth and in pristine condition.
